entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-02-20
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • MAUI Blazor on Windows 11 KB5022845: MainWindow 'white blick' #13461
  • [Debug]: The framework should break to warn user more efficient #13460
  • Core isolation #13459
  • Microsoft.Maui.Devices.Flashlight: Check if supported #13458
  • Certian markup causes CollectionView contents to vanish when updated #13457
  • Resizetizer is not working if you get a .DS_Store file inside you Fonts files folder #13452
  • [WinUI] [UIKit] CollectionView Items do not resize if the inner content changes. #13451
    Backlog
  • Visual Studio for Mac does not support setting TargetFramework settings for iOS/Mac Binding Libraries #13450

Closed

  • Error: System.Exception #13298
  • VMware #13219
  • [Windows][Picker] Background and BackgroundColour properties are not updating #13269
  • Element.OnChildRemoved() - Incorrect variable used in function. #12633
    Backlog
  • great bug report #13439

PullRequests

Merged

  • Geolocation: Add #nullable for Essentials Geolocation code #13371
    area/essentials 🍞, community ✨
  • Switch to net7.0 as prev version (#13447) #13448

Updated

  • Simplification of user interface declaration in code #12728
    proposal/open, community ✨
  • Shell routing and Service registration automation #13402
    area/shell 🐢, community ✨
  • Fix e-mail URI escaping recipients #13392
    area/essentials 🍞, community ✨
  • [Windows] Notify changes in CollectionView Layouts #13137
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/collectionview 📃
  • Implement Keyboard on SearchBarHandler #9851
    t/bug, area/controls 🎮, control-entry
  • [Windows] Add helper method to get GetFirstChildOfType with null support. #13421
    platform/windows 🪟, t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • [Windows] Fix Button LineBreakMode property #10759
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/controls 🎮, control-button
  • [macOS/iOS] Fix RequestedThemeChanged event #11199
    t/bug, area/Xaml </>
  • [Windows] Changes in SwipeViewHandler #11229
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/controls 🎮, control-swipeview
  • [Housekeeping] Port latest fixes from Xamarin.Forms to .NET MAUI #11420
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • Avoid crash using BoxView visibility (avoid unnecessary parent) #11439
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/controls 🎮
  • [Android] Fix issue correctly updating WrapperView content visibility #11531
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/drawing ✏️
  • [iOS] Fix SearchBar focus issues #11698
    t/bug, platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-entry
  • Fix gestures in Label Spans #12027
    t/bug, area/controls 🎮, control-label, area/gestures
  • [Housekeeping] Alternative to #11795 #12134
    t/bug, platform/iOS 🍎, t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • [Android] Allow to update Entry Background (once established) #12227
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/drawing ✏️, area/controls 🎮
  • [Android & iOS] Use the correct colors by themes with Alerts on Android and iOS #13318
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, area/theme
  • [Android & iOS] Fix focus issues with DatePicker and TimePicker #13321
    t/bug, area/controls 🎮, control-datetimepicker
  • [iOS] Fix Border Content clipping issues #10964
    t/bug, area/drawing ✏️, platform/iOS 🍎
  • Bump System.Text.Json from 7.0.1 to 7.0.2 #13358
    do-not-merge, area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #13434
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
